productEmsList.title: NMEA 2000® Connectivity
productEmsList.tooltip: Supports NMEA 2000 connectivity for Fusion-Link™ wired integration with compatible multifunction displays (MFD) and NRX Series wired remote controls.

productEmsList.title: SiriusXM-Ready®
productEmsList.tooltip: Enjoy high-quality satellite radio with SiriusXM® advanced features (continental U.S. and Canada only, requires optional SiriusXM Connect vehicle tuner and subscription).

PRODUCT_PAGE_SUPPLEMENTARY_DISCLAIMERS.PRODUCT_PAGE_AWESOME_DISCLAIMER: Engineering enhancements are ongoing and may not be reflected in the pictures, videos and specifications.

seoAttributes.description: The RA70 Series from Fusion® comprises two DIN-sized marine stereos, designed to deliver quality audio entertainment experiences on the water at value-packed price points
seoAttributes.seoKeywords: fusion, marine stereos, audio, entertainment, subwoofer
seoAttributes.seoTitle: Garmin Fusion RA70 Series Marine Stereos
seoAttributes.title: Fusion® RA70 Series Marine Stereos

010-01516-01.pvName: Fusion® RA70 Series Marine Stereos, MS-RA70 Marine Stereo with Bluetooth®

seo.ogDescription: The RA70 Series from Fusion® comprises two DIN-sized marine stereos, designed to deliver quality audio entertainment experiences on the water at value-packed price points
seo.title: Garmin Fusion RA70 Series Marine Stereos

010-01516-01.shippingDisclaimer: Ready to ship in 1–3 business days.

specs.<a href=\"https://www.garmin.com/en-AU/: IPX7 (front panel only, when properly installed)
specs.Additional:
NMEA 2000® LEN: 1 (50 mA), MS-RA70N and MS-RA70NSX only
Fusion-Link™ control: MS-RA70: smart device and Garmin watch; MS-RA70N and MS-RA70NSX: MFD, smart device and Garmin watch
SiriusXM-ready: MS-RA70NSX only
DAB+ ready: MS-RA70 and MS-RA70N only
Supports NRX wired remote: MS-RA70N and MS-RA70NSX only
specs.Line out: 2 (L + R per zone, requires external amplification)
specs.Multi-language interface: Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Spanish
specs.Rated power output (4 Ohm): 26 watts RMS x 4 @ 14.4 V input < 10% THD
specs.Supported sources:
AM, FM, Bluetooth®, USB audio, iPhone®, iPod®, AUX x1, AOA
MS-RA70NSX: SiriusXM-Ready (U.S. only, requires optional SiriusXM Connect vehicle tuner)
MS-RA70 and MS-RA70N: DAB+ ready (available in Europe and Australia only)
specs.Wireless frequencies/protocols:
Bluetooth®: 2.4 GHz @ +1.9 dBm nominal
ANT®: 2.4 GHz @ +1.9 dBm nominal

inTheBoxTab.content:
All RA70 Series stereos contain:

  • DIN mounting plate
  • Four 8-gauge, self-tapping screws
  • Power and speaker wiring harness
  • Auxiliary-in, line-out, and subwoofer-out wiring harnesses
  • Documentation

MS-RA70N also includes a 2 metre NMEA 2000® drop cable
inTheBoxTab.title: In the Box

overviewTab.title: Overview

specsTab.content:
General
Dimension7.4" x 2.36" x 4.87" (188 x 60 x 123.5 mm)
Weight

1.23 lbs (556 g)

Water rating IPX7 (front panel only, when properly installed)
Display2.6″ optically bonded monochrome LCD
Operating temperature32° to 122° F (0° to 50° C)
Current (max)15 A

Networking
NMEA 2000® LENSee Additional
Bluetooth® wireless rangeUp to 30 ft (10 metres)
ANT® wireless rangeUp to 10 ft (3 metres)
Wireless frequencies/protocolsBluetooth®: 2.4 GHz @ +1.9 dBm nominal
ANT®: 2.4 GHz @ +1.9 dBm nominal

Audio
AmplifierClass-AB (4 ohm)

Electrical features
Power Input10.8 - 16 VDC
Compass safe distance5.9" (150 mm)

Stereo features
Peak power200 watts
Rated power output (4 Ohm)26 watts RMS x 4 @ 14.4 V input < 10% THD
ControlYes (see Additional)
Multi-Zone™️ technology2 zones
Bluetooth® wireless technology
ANT® wireless technology
SiriusXM-readySee Additional
DAB+ readySee Additional
Supports NRX wired remoteSee Additional
Multi-language interfaceDutch, English, French, German, Italian, Spanish
Software updatesUSB
Warranty1year

Sources
Supported sourcesAM, FM, Bluetooth®, USB audio, iPhone®, iPod®, AUX x1, AOA
MS-RA70NSX: SiriusXM-Ready (U.S. only, requires optional SiriusXM Connect vehicle tuner)
MS-RA70 and MS-RA70N: DAB+ ready (available in Europe and Australia only)

Connections
Auxiliary inputs (RCA)1
NMEA 2000® ports1 (MS-RA70N and MS-RA70NSX only)
USB ports1
SiriusXM ports1 (MS-RA70NSX only)
AM/FM ports (Motorola antenna connector)1
Speaker connections4 (2 zone amplified)
RCA Pre-out (left, right and subwoofer)2 zones (requires external amplification)
Line out2 (L + R per zone, requires external amplification)
Subwoofer outZone 1 (requires external amplification)

Additional
AdditionalNMEA 2000® LEN: 1 (50 mA), MS-RA70N and MS-RA70NSX only
Fusion-Link™ control: MS-RA70: smart device and Garmin watch; MS-RA70N and MS-RA70NSX: MFD, smart device and Garmin watch
SiriusXM-ready: MS-RA70NSX only
DAB+ ready: MS-RA70 and MS-RA70N only
Supports NRX wired remote: MS-RA70N and MS-RA70NSX only
